org.apache.solr.analytics.accumulator

Class BasicAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.SimpleCollector
      • org.apache.solr.analytics.accumulator.ValueAccumulator
        • org.apache.solr.analytics.accumulator.BasicAccumulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collector, LeafCollector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FacetingAccumulator

    public class BasicAccumulator
extends ValueAccumulator
    A BasicAccumulator manages the ValueCounters and Expressions without regard to Facets.
